verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year שָׁלֹ֔שׁ <S%H7969><s%> Now it came to pass in the third לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> of Hoshea בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> began to reign חִזְקִיָּ֥ה <S%H2396><s%> [that] Hezekiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָחָ֖ז <S%H271><s%> of Ahaz מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> Twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> was he when he began to reign וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H8672><s%> and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> His mother's אֲבִ֖י <S%H21><s%> also [was] Abi בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter זְכַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H2148><s%> of Zachariah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> did דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> according to all that David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

ה֣וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> He הֵסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> He removed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּמ֗וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places וְשִׁבַּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> and brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּצֵּבֹ֔ת <S%H4676><s%> the images וְכָרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> and cut down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֲשֵׁרָ֑ה <S%H842><s%> the groves וְכִתַּת֩ <S%H3807><s%> and brake in pieces נְחַ֨שׁ <S%H5175><s%> serpent הַנְּחֹ֜שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> the brasen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> had made מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> that Moses כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַיָּמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> for unto those days הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> those הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מְקַטְּרִ֣ים <S%H6999><s%> did burn incense ל֔וֹ וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> to it and he called ל֖וֹ נְחֻשְׁתָּֽן׃ <S%H5180><s%> it Nehushtan

בַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּטָ֑ח <S%H982><s%> He trusted וְאַחֲרָ֞יו <S%H310><s%> so that after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> none הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָמֹ֗הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> him was none like him among all the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> nor [any] that were before

וַיִּדְבַּק֙ <S%H1692><s%> For he clave בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> [and] departed מֵאַֽחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> not from following וַיִּשְׁמֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> him but kept מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4687><s%> his commandments אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he יֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> whithersoever he went forth יַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> was with him [and] he prospered וַיִּמְרֹ֥ד <S%H4775><s%> and he rebelled בְּמֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> against the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not עֲבָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H5647><s%> and served

הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He הִכָּ֧ה <S%H5221><s%> He smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far עַזָּ֖ה <S%H5804><s%> [even] unto Gaza וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלֶ֑יהָ <S%H1366><s%> and the borders מִמִּגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> thereof from the tower נוֹצְרִ֖ים <S%H5341><s%> of the watchmen עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city מִבְצָֽר׃ <S%H4013><s%> to the fenced פ

וַֽיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become בַּשָּׁנָ֤ה <S%H8141><s%> year הָֽרְבִיעִית֙ <S%H7243><s%> And it came to pass in the fourth לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> which הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ית <S%H7637><s%> which [was] the seventh לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> of Hoshea בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עָלָ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> came up שַׁלְמַנְאֶ֧סֶר <S%H8022><s%> [that] Shalmaneser מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁ֛וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> against Samaria וַיָּ֥צַר <S%H6696><s%> and besieged עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַֽיִּלְכְּדֻ֗הָ <S%H3920><s%> they took מִקְצֵה֙ <S%H7097><s%> And at the end שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> of three שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years בִּשְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> year שֵׁ֖שׁ <S%H8337><s%> it [even] in the sixth לְחִזְקִיָּ֑ה <S%H2396><s%> of Hezekiah הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> which שְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> year תֵּ֗שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> that [is] the ninth לְהוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H1954><s%> of Hoshea מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִלְכְּדָ֖ה <S%H3920><s%> was taken שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> Samaria

וַיֶּ֧גֶל <S%H1540><s%> did carry away מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אַשּׁ֛וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אַשּׁ֑וּרָה <S%H804><s%> unto Assyria וַיַּנְחֵ֞ם <S%H5148><s%> and put בַּחְלַ֧ח <S%H2477><s%> them in Halah וּבְחָב֛וֹר <S%H2249><s%> and in Habor נְהַ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> [by] the river גּוֹזָ֖ן <S%H1470><s%> of Gozan וְעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> and in the cities מָדָֽי׃ <S%H4074><s%> of the Medes

עַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither שָׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> Because they obeyed בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> not the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיַּעַבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> but transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִית֔וֹ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> [and] all that Moses עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> and would not hear וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> neither עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> [them] nor do פ

וּבְאַרְבַּע֩ <S%H702><s%> four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> year לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king חִזְקִיָּ֗ה <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah עָלָ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> come up סַנְחֵרִ֤יב <S%H5576><s%> did Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֧י <S%H5892><s%> cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <S%H1219><s%> against all the fenced וַֽיִּתְפְּשֵֽׂם׃ <S%H8610><s%> and took

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent חִזְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אַשּׁוּר֩ ׀ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria לָכִ֨ישָׁה ׀ <S%H3923><s%> to Lachish לֵאמֹ֤ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> saying חָטָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H2398><s%> I have offended שׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> return מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whatever תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> from me that which thou puttest עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> on אֶשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> on me will I bear וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> appointed מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אַשּׁ֜וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of חִזְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2396><s%> unto Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> talents כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty כִּכַּ֥ר <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> of gold

וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> gave חִזְקִיָּ֔ה <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [him] all the silver הַנִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> that was found בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּבְאֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> and in the treasures בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he קִצַּ֨ץ <S%H7112><s%> cut off חִזְקִיָּ֜ה <S%H2396><s%> did Hezekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּלְת֨וֹת <S%H1817><s%> [the gold from] the doors הֵיכַ֤ל <S%H1964><s%> of the temple יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹ֣מְנ֔וֹת <S%H547><s%> and [from] the pillars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִפָּ֔ה <S%H6823><s%> had overlaid חִזְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2396><s%> which Hezekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and gave לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> it to the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria פ
